techmeme.title: 11x, which makes AI bots that help salespeople with common tasks, raised $50M led by a16z at a $320M valuation, after raising a $24M Series A in September 2024 (Bloomberg)
MicroStrategy says it bought 27,200 bitcoin for roughly $2.03B in cash at an estimated $74,463 per coin, taking its total bitcoin holding to 279,420 (Adam James/The Block)
Sources: Amazon is developing smart glasses for its delivery drivers to guide them to, around, and within buildings, but the tech may take years to perfect (Greg Bensinger/Reuters)
FTX sues crypto trader "Humpy the Whale" alleging margin trading market manipulation from January 2021 to September 2022, leading to FTX and Alameda losing $1B (Callan Quinn/CoinDesk)
a16z says it is "very optimistic" that the US government will "foster innovation" in crypto and there is a "pathway for constructive engagement" with regulators (a16z crypto)
